    Register your interest in NSCamp

    We want to keep the first NSCamp small, just to reduce the amount of organising involved as we're going to be figuring this out as we go along.

    So we're limiting registration to 30-50 people at the moment. This is a soft limit, as we're also trying to gauge interest from the community.

    To register your interest in NSCamp, fill in this google form and we'll keep you updated.

    Let us know what you think about NSCamp and if you want to be involved in organising it.
